de.mpa.client.ui

Class GradientColorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Color
      • de.mpa.client.ui.GradientColorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Paint, Transparency, Serializable

    public class GradientColorAdapter
extends Color
    Wrapper for the Color class to redirect to a GradientPaint context for use with Graphics objects.
    Author:
    A. Behne
    See Also:
    Graphics2D.setPaint(java.awt.Paint), Serialized Form
